sourcesContent: import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import { SidebarContainer, SidebarClose, CloseText, CloseIcon, SidebarItens, SidebarTextContainer, SidebarSubContainer, SidebarTotal, SidebarTrash } from './SidebarStyle'; import { CartContext } from './CartContext'; export default function CartSidebar() { const { cart, removeFromCart, clearCart } = useContext(CartContext); return ( Seu Carrinho {cart.length > 0 ? ( cart.map(item => ( {item.name} R$ {item.price} Quantidade: {item.amount} removeFromCart(item.id)}> )) ) : ( Seu carrinho est√° vazio. )} Total: R$ {total} ); }
